ygData.subject: Petition
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, everyone needs to decide who they want submitting this petition.  Amatai (the onelist moderator) wants what mails I have received from people here so
ygData.messageBody:
Well, everyone needs to decide who they want submitting this petition. Amatai (the onelist moderator) wants what mails I have received from people here so that he can submit a petition. Its all up to everyone here.

I also liked the recent note concerning out pets. I haven't used my pet in at least 10 levels now. Would you all prefer if we were to get a lifetap series over having a pet? I feel that our pets are actually more of a burden than a benefit usually, but not always. I feel that Verant has always tried to point out that we are special because we're the only hybrid that gets a pet. Well...I don't think it is that much of a benefit and perhaps if they were to take it away, maybe we'd get other things to replace it.

Anyway, just my 2cc worth. Let me know what you think.

-Keziah
skpetition@...
